subject: Product Testing & Collaboration Inquiry
description_text:
Hello SIMSONN Team,

I’m already registered with you, received my discount code and have ordered your pedals. Once they arrive, I’ll be testing them on my sim racing YouTube channel and, if I’m truly satisfied, I will create a detailed review video.

Since my content focuses heavily on sim racing hardware and honest product reviews, I wanted to ask if you would be open to potential collaboration, especially regarding product testing, reviews, or long-term use of your products on my channel.

Thank you very much for your time. I’m looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Nico Daucher/ Neyko Racing

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@NeykoRacingInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/neykoracingTwitch: https://www.twitch.tv/neykoracingTikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@neykoracing

conversations.body_text: Hi Nico,     Thank you so much for reaching out, and we truly appreciate your interest in collaborating with us.  We’d be happy to explore a potential partnership with you — just not at this very moment. Our team is currently fully occupied and we’re unable to take on new collaboration projects right away. Once the timing is right, we’ll definitely be open to discussing possibilities together.  In the meantime, we hope you’ll really enjoy your new pedals. If you have any questions, need assistance, or run into anything at all, please feel free to contact us anytime — we’re always here to help.     Best regards, The Simsonn Team

Hi Simsonn Team,
Thank you for your feedback. I will still make a review video once I'm satisfied with the pedals, to help you out. Should I send you another partnership request in a few weeks or months?

Best regards,
Nico Daucher/ Neyko Racing
    Am Donnerstag, 27. November 2025 um 09:31:24 MEZ hat service@simsonn.com
